alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, southeastern El Paso, western Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot to near Boone to 8 miles southwest of Fowler. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Boone, Crowley, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County
